title: A compendious and a very fruteful treatyse, teachynge the waye of dyenge well written to a frende, by the flowre of lerned men of his tyme, Thomas Lupsete Londoner, late deceassed, on whose soule Iesu haue mercy.
author: Lupset, Thomas, 1495?-1530.
notes: Printer's name and publication date from colophon.
